mapper.update: update sales set itemCode = #{itemCode}, branchCode = #{branchCode}, quantity = #{quantity}, price = #{price}, salesDate = #{salesDate} where seq = #{seq}
update sales set salesDate = #{salesDate} where code = #{code}
update sales set salesDate = #{salesDate} where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select * from sales where code = #{code} and salesDate is null order by seq asc
select * from sales where code = #{code} and salesDate is not null order by seq asc

select count(*) from (select distinct salesCode from (select sales.code salesCode from sales, item, branch where sales.salesDate is null and sales.itemCode = item.code and sales.branchCode = branch.code))

select count(*) from (select distinct salesCode from (select sales.code salesCode from sales, item, branch where sales.salesDate is not null and sales.itemCode = item.code and sales.branchCode = branch.code))

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select distinct salesCode, branchName from (select sales.code salesCode, item.name itemName, branch.name branchName from sales, item, branch where (sales.salesDate is null and sales.itemCode = item.code and sales.branchCode = branch.code) and (sales.code like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or item.type1 like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or item.type2 like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or item.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or item.brand like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or branch.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')) order by salesCode asc) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select distinct salesCode, branchName from (select sales.code salesCode, item.name itemName, branch.name branchName from sales, item, branch where (sales.salesDate is not null and sales.itemCode = item.code and sales.branchCode = branch.code) and (sales.code like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or item.type1 like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or item.type2 like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or item.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or item.brand like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or branch.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')) order by salesCode desc) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
